channel.title: Hiring on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Hiring on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Technical Writer
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for Technical Writer to join Dwarves and work remotely. ü§ò Apply now (We respond within three days)

item.title: Marketing and Communications Specialist
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for Marketing & Communications Specialists to join Dwarves and work remotely. The ideal candidate will have a passion for technology, a strong understanding of the software development industry, and excellent communication skills.

item.title: Business Development
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for Business Development talents to join Dwarves and work remotely. The ideal candidates will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, fostering strong client relationships, and driving growth by promoting our services to potential clients globally.

item.title: Culture Handbook
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Towards growth Keep learning and growing. We started this team out of software practice advancement. The continuous study lays the foundation for the future growth.

item.title: Executive Assistant
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for an Executive Assistant to join Dwarves and work remotely. We are seeking a highly organized, proactive, and experienced Executive Assistant to provide support to our senior executives.

item.title: How We Hire
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hiring means we need help. We only hire people who tell us what to do, not the other way around. We always look for long-term teammates that why we want to ensure the new hire is a value fit and culture fit.

item.title: How We Work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We do Agile We build software. The way we see it is a collaboration between multiple people in the team with sufficient knowledge on the domain and clearly understand the project vision that they can quickly adapt to the changes in the market.

item.title: Making A Career
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The average tenure of employees working at many technology companies today is shockingly low. At both Amazon, Google and other companies, it‚Äôs just around one year.

item.title: Technical Recruiter
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for a Technical Recruiter to join Dwarves and work remotely. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in sourcing, attracting, and hiring top-tier talents and take care of our team members’ growth.

item.title: The Manifesto
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Aim for Quality Quality exists in every piece of work. We thrive to deliver the best because we can.

item.title: What We Stand For
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Empower Innovation with Software Craftsmanship Innovation happens. There are many startups found and raise fund every day. They focus on making significant positive changes, impact millions of people, lead to breakthroughs and support the foundation of economic growth.

item.title: What We Value
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before anything else, values come first. The value is important to us. They are what we proud of. They help guide us when we are facing a difficult decision.

item.title: Where We Work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Office The Dwarves HQ is in Saigon, Vietnam. Thirty people and two cats have desk space in the Saigon office, but those people also work from home regularly.

item.title: Backend Engineer, Go/Elixir/Rust
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Requirements A Linux or Mac user Familiar with Agile development process, esp. Scrum framework Experience with Golang/Elixir/Rust Experience in shipping web applications to production, CI/CD with docker centric workflow Familiar with running large scale web services Understanding of system performance and scaling Possess excellent communication, sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills, able to think critically of the current system regarding growth and stability Experience in writing good unit test Responsibility Define and shape the fundamentals of engineering at Dwarves Foundation Design and write maintainable code at scale Continuously discuss, debate with other team members to propose optimal solutions for different problems Maintain and monitor the systems to make sure there is no disruption in our services What you can look forward to You will be working closely with a team of talented, kind people.

item.title: React Native Developer
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for talented developer with experience in React Native to join Dwarves and work remotely, on a fast-growing US startup.

item.title: Careers
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we put Foundation in our name, we mean it. We want to put in place a team of go-getters who solve real-world problems, build big platforms, and spread goodwill across communities.

item.title: Careers
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we put Foundation in our name, we mean it. We want to put in place a team of go-getters who solve real-world problems, build big platforms, and spread goodwill across communities.

item.title: Life at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re like-minded teammates who pursue ambitious goals with tech culture and codes of conduct. Build a place we love to work at We build this company like we build a product.

item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: ü§ù As an engineer at Dwarves, you will be working closely with a team of talented, kind people and working directly with our clients.

item.title: Community Executive
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What it takes to succeed Prior marketing experience at technology firm preferred Prior experience planning, facilitating events or podcasts Strong interpersonal and communication skills Can-do attitude & strong team ethics Excellent English written and communication skills Able to adapt, wear multiple hats, and work a flexible schedule Able to work in a fast paced and dynamic work environment Having knowledge about web 3.

item.title: Visual Designer
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What it takes to succeed A portfolio showing your high quality, thoughtful design including user interfaces, iconography, and illustration Knowledge of typographic principles and design Knowledge of brand principles Knowledge of information architecture, usability Experience designing for web and mobile is a plus Experience with motion design and illustration is a plus What you’ll get to do Own our product design system and evolve it to meet the growing needs Design sophisticated visuals, from concept to execution Lead the creation of a design platform, design guidelines and communication interface behaviors that allow designers and engineers to execute faster and better Collaborate efficiently with the brand, product design, and engineering to successfully implement work Our interview process Review & Reference check

item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In today’s competitive business environment, it is crucial for organizations to have a clear understanding of the value and performance of their employees.

item.title: Dwarves Foundation Apprenticeship Batch Of 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It‚Äôs our second attempt rolling out this program. But the motivation stays the same: Accelerating someone‚Äôs current software development skillset.

item.title: Growth
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Marketing We are open to a marketing position! If you are looking for a tech-savvy company to contribute to and make your career, this may be your opportunity to put in your spirit and ideal setup.

item.title: Intern
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Program In 2018, we launched the first Summer Internship Program for students with or without Engineering background from top universities.

item.title: Benefits And Perks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Since the majority of Dwarves Foundation employees work in Saigon, this section is written with that as the default. Some benefits don‚Äôt make sense in other countries.

item.title: Dwarves Apprenticeship 2022: Meet The Mentors Ngoc Thanh Pham
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Team is shifting our focus to blockchain technology. We offer study groups and blockchain-based projects for peeps to grow and catch up with this rising trend.

item.title: Dwarves Apprenticeship 2022: Meet The Mentors Tuan Dao
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Tuan Dao - Senior Frontend/ Blockchain Engineer Tuan has 4+ years of experience under his belt, 2 out of those 4+ was spent at Dwarves Foundation.

item.title: The stages of hiring at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, It‚Äôs Han and Nikki, back in your inbox for another Dwarves Updates. First, we are delighted to share that Dwarves placed top 100 in the Financial Times‚Äô Asia-Pacific High-Growth Company.

item.title: Apprentice Program
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: About the program Apprenticeship is a six-month earn-and-learn training program; it’s a way to learn about being a professional software developer.

item.title: Applying Myersbriggs Type Indicator In Hiring
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Getting Started This is a part from our study how to recognize people traits at the first sight. This guide is made to help HRs or Project Lead have a quick view of potential candidates and/or new teammates personality.

item.title: Dwarves Updates
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hi, this is Han, the CEO of Dwarves Foundation. This month the Dwarves score 40th client that we have the honor to serve.

item.title: A Tips Of Hiring - Do & Don't
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Many companies out there get lured by the vision of scaling up. An unwritten rule of ’the more man we have, the better output we create’.

item.title: Building A Solid High Performing Team
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sustainable growth companies are built by teams of shining constellations rather than just several bright stars. It all starts with recruiting.

item.title: Hiring For Operations Team
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Operations is a very sensitive area of the company, so be very picky. A great ops person can dramatically improve the way your company works and make your life a lot easier.

item.title: Checklist: Candidate
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Background & Skills Logic qualified English skills qualified Technical (specialized) knowledge & skills qualified Personalities This hiring practice can tell

item.title: Checklist: Hiring
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Resume Collecting Job Description List of job sites/hiring channels Job post materials Hiring system (Notion) Timeline Invitation & calendar send out (also the interviewer assigned?

item.title: Email Template: Assignment Inviation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Title: Dwarves Foundation - Assignment Invitation Body Hello [name] Congratulations on passing our Pre-Assessment test for [position] position. To better match your potential with our role, we would like you to complete an assignment at [link].

item.title: Email Template: Assignment Inviation (Skip pre-assessment)
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Title: Dwarves Foundation - Assignment Invitation Body Hi [name] Congratulations on reaching the second round for [position] position. To better match your potential with our role, we would like you to complete a small exercise at [link].

item.title: Email Template: Follow-up Onboarding Items
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Title: Follow-up on Welcome Onboard email Body Hi [name], Our pleasure to welcome you to Dwarves Team. As discussed, please help to proceed with these items to finish the onboarding process

item.title: Email Template: Offer Letter
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Title: Dwarves Foundation - Offer letter Body Hi [name], Thank you for your interest in the [position] position and your effort of taking the interview process at Dwarves Foundation.

item.title: Email Template: Referral Bonus Confirmation Note
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Use case: Whenever a Dwarves refers to a teammate that successfully deployed to a project, we use this template to announce the official start date of their referral bonus.

item.title: Email Template: Rejection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Screening Rejection Title: Dwarves Foundation - Application Result Body Hi [name], We really appreciate your interest in Dwarves Foundation. However, we‚Äôre sorry to inform that this position might not be the best match for you at the moment.

item.title: Email Template: Welcome Onboard
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Title: Dwarves Foundation - Welcome Onboard Body Hi¬†[name], Thank you for accepting the offer to¬†join Dwarves Foundation as a¬†[position].

item.title: Getting Started
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Getting Started Expectation Welcome onboard. Getting started at Dwarves Foundation can be overwhelming. Different roles have different expectation. Get to know who does what to warm up.

item.title: How We Hire
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: How we hire Hiring means we need help. We only hire people who tell us what to do, not the other way around.

item.title: Hiring Approach
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Philosophy Hire people who tell us what to do, not the other way around. Company culture is who you Hire, Fire & Promote.
